descriptionHtml:
Warning: you need Dragonrend to complete a certain stage of this quest, you\'ve been warned.

Background:

 An old guild has resurfaced, now they\'re seeking your aid in rebuilding their power and glory. Will you answer their plea?

Features:

All new quest line, I made the decision to gut the original mod in order to limit any possible problems. This version will also allow a faster pace in additions to quests available.

Note: A clean save will be required this will not work with saves from the last version. 

The quest line will start via a change of location. 

Install: 

First remove the esp and voice file from the last version IE delete (Skyrim>data>Sound>Voice>newmod.esp file) and the actual esp.

Place the new files into your data folder, or use the NMM to dl (easy way).

Known Issues: 
nothing major so far. A few incidents of people not sitting in their proper seats are all I\'ve run into.

Compatibility: 

Should work with most mods, you may have issues with certain mods that change the data in Riverwood/Dragonbridge and Solitude. Try messing with your load order if you have such problems.
author: Malickie
